description: Grilled sliced mushrooms, rocket and juicy tomatoes pair with a green-goddess dressing for an easy salad side.
keywords: Mushroom Salad With Green Goddess Dressing
name: Mushroom Salad With Green Goddess Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Birch & Waite Green Goddess Dressing
200 g Woolworths white cup sliced mushrooms

recipeInstructions.text: Place tomatoes and baby rocket on a serving plate. Top with mushrooms and drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with chopped almond kernels.
Place tomatoes and baby rocket on a serving plate. Top with mushrooms and drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with chopped almond kernels.
